project.name: C-C459A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C459A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Takes an input integer and creates temporary files, filling them with a large string. It then attempts cleanup, but if more than 50 files were created, then only the last 50 will be cleaned up. Given a large enough input the program will use up a significant ammount of disk space creating temporary files and not cleaning them up.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 6462 -s 6 -m "10" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
